`https://github.com/clMathLibraries/clRNG`

# Random uniform

```{r date}
date()
```


```{r packages, results='hide'}
library('gpuR')
```

Use double precision if the GPU supports it
```{r setType}
theType = c('float','double')[1+gpuInfo()$double_support]
theType
```

Create some streams
```{r testStream}
Nglobal = 4
streams = clRNG:::cpp_mrg31k3pCreateStreams(Nglobal);
t(streams)
```

Generate some uniforms
```{r test}
x = vclVector(length=8L, type=theType)

streams2 <- clRNG::runifGpu(x, streams=streams)
t(streams)[1:4,]
t(streams2)[1:4,]
as.vector(x)
```
Generate some different uniforms
```{r testAgain}
clRNG::runifGpu(x, streams=streams2)
as.vector(x)
```

Reuse the intial seed
```{r testRepeat}
clRNG::runifGpu(x, streams=streams)
as.vector(x)
```

```{r hist}


Nglobal = 256
streams = clRNG:::cpp_mrg31k3pCreateStreams(Nglobal)
if(gpuInfo()$maxAllocatableMem > 1e10) {
  NperItem = 5e5
} else {
  NperItem = 200
}
x = vclVector(length=as.integer(Nglobal*NperItem), type=theType)
length(x)*1e-6

system.time(junk <- runif(length(x)))
system.time(streams <- clRNG::runifGpu(x, Nglobal, streams=streams))

xVec = as.vector(x)

hist(xVec, breaks=seq(-0.1,1.1,len=121))

xMat = matrix(xVec, ncol=Nglobal, byrow=TRUE)

theLim = 0.5 + 0.1*c(-1,1)
plot(as.vector(xMat[-1,1]), as.vector(xMat[-nrow(xMat),1]), xlim = theLim, ylim=theLim, pch='.')
plot(as.vector(xMat[-1,2]), as.vector(xMat[-nrow(xMat),2]), xlim = theLim, ylim=theLim, pch='.')

```
